section.name: Mobile Services SMTP-Gateway-Test-TCP
section.p: This component is a test component tests the SMTP-Gateway component by sending a email message using the JXME endpoint service.
The application can be started using the start.sh script in the smtpgw/test-tcp/bin directory.
Note that since Knopflerfish does not allow paths cantaining ~ (UNIX home directory) the relative path /home/muellerr specified int init.xargs has to modified appropriately.

The SMTP server host as well as the sender and receiver address, message subject and message body as well as the host that provides the TCP endpoint inclusively port number can also be specified in the init.xargs with properties:
